points.b: A logic puzzle where a cube spawns on a random path of tiles. The cube must reach the end and also step on every tile along the way. The maps are generated using C++ and iterations on a grid.
A project for procedurally generated biomes using C++. I use 3D tiles of different material: dirt, grass, and stone. Water may be added later for ocean generation.
A project in which I generate random maps using perlin noise and the diamond square algorithm in Unreal Engine C++.

A survival runner in which the player is running horizontally through randomly placed, prefabricated map parts to escape a wall of spikes. Uses C++ and prefabs to create level pieces as the player progresses.
